column5: Real or fake?  SHARK SURFER DUDE
HAHAHAHHA i donnno it kinda looks fake. Check out the way the fin breaks the water... its very cool though...
Yeah,  I think it's fake. The guy who sent it to me said there are to many breaks in the editing.  Funny though!
You can see the prop wash in front of the fin in one part, they are towing it lol...  Burt
Yeah, I always throw my heavy deep sea tackle in the ocean when I'm done fishin' with it for the day... while it's still attached to the fish!
Espeshiallery when it's attached to a shark.
